benchmark_details.name: AgentFail
benchmark_details.overview: A dataset of 307 annotated failure logs from platform-orchestrated agentic systems, constructed to aid in identifying root causes of failures in these systems, providing a corresponding taxonomy and benchmark for automated diagnosis.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically identify root causes of failures in platform-orchestrated agentic systems and provide guidelines for more reliable system development.

data.source: Failure logs collected from two representative agentic AI development platforms, Dify and Coze.
data.annotation: Annotated by independent experts using Grounded Theory method.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy of root cause identification is calculated based on the success rate of identifying failures
methodology.interpretation: An accuracy of 33.6% indicates a challenging diagnosis task.
methodology.validation: Systematic qualitative validation through expert consensus.
